borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Communal garden - Starting from outside no. 1:T1 Apple (small) - Crown reduce to previous pruning points (2.5m from height) retaining inner furnishings to create natural flowing canopy - Remove epicormic growth from stemT2 Cherry - Crown reduce lightly (30cm) retaining inner furnishings to create natural flowing canopy - Remove all dead wood Remove epicormic growth from stemT3 Apple - Crown reduce to previous pruning points (1.5m from height) retaining inner furnishings to create natural flowing canopyRemove epicormic growth from stemT4 Cherry - Crown reduce lightly on laterals only (0.5m) retaining inner furnishings to create natural flowing canopyRemove epicormic growth from stemT5 Apple - Crown reduce to previous pruning points (1.5m from height and sides) retaining inner furnishings to create natural flowing canopy - Remove epicormic growth from stem
